name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior BIM Engineer with 8 years of experience, I leverage expertise in **BIM**, **information management**, and **API** integration to deliver innovative solutions within the built environment. My background in parametric modeling using tools such as **Grasshopper** and **Dynamo**, along with proficiency in **Bentley ProjectWise**, **Trimble Connect**, and **Autodesk ACC**, allows me to effectively manage and collaborate on complex projects.
My technical proficiency extends to applying **AI** for intelligent automation and utilizing **Power BI** for data visualization and performance analytics, ensuring stakeholders have access to real-time insights. I hold a strong foundation in high-performance software development leveraging modern programming technologies, with a history of successful project management across the healthcare and financial sectors.
I am dedicated to implementing workflows that optimize project delivery, improve compliance standards, and enhance collaboration. My strategic approach prioritizes sustainable and efficient building practices while adhering to industry standards.
